channel.title: postscript on Matthäus J. Mrozek

item.title: Postscript on: Recap Week 38 (2023)
item.description: It was my first Reel with voiceover, and for the first time, I offered a relatively deep insight into my life in this format. Therefore, I was especially eager to see your reactions and the number of views, which is why I watched it myself multiple times. This felt like a change in perspective. As soon as the Reel was online, I viewed it differently and, above all, more closely.
